homepage.textLeft: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm a web developer who loves turning creative ideas into functional, beautiful websites. Let’s explore the magic of clean code and captivating design together.
homepage.textRight: This is where creativity meets functionality. Dive into my projects, explore my skills, and discover how I can help bring your ideas to life through modern web development and thoughtful design.

experience.description1: Development of a student personal-page site using React, Redux, TypeScript, PostgreSQL and Figma.
experience.description2: Development of web applications and improving user interfaces. Skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Redux.
experience.description3: Created a landing page using WordPress. Skills: WordPress, HTML, CSS, PHP.
experience.description4: Worked with MySQL, programming, and web application development. Skills: PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript.
experience.description5: Created graphic designs. Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, CorelDRAW.
experience.description6: Developed software. Skills: C++, Delphi, SQL.
